definitions.text: the skilled practice of a practical occupation
examples: he learned his trade as an apprentice

definitions.text: a vehicle designed for navigation in or on water or air or through outer space
people who perform a particular kind of skilled work
examples: he represented the craft of brewers
as they say in the trade

definitions.text: skill in an occupation or trade
shrewdness as demonstrated by being skilled in deception
make by hand and with much skill
examples: The artisan crafted a complicated tool
